attributes.action: Introduce a Mandatory Shrinkflation Label on consumable goods
attributes.background: Legislation should be introduced to force companies who have reduced the size of their product or/and increased the price of their products by more than the Consumer Price Index rate to put a large label on the packing indicating the size of the reduction and the price increase.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655516
